Upgrade.Title: Tal Shiar Sub-Commander
Upgrade.Ability: WHEN ATTACKING: If this ship has an [EVADE] Token beside it: This ship may convert 1 of the defending ship's [EVADE] into a [BLANK].

Upgrade.Title: All Power to Weapons
Upgrade.Ability: COMBAT PHASE: Place 3 [TIME] Tokens on this card and disable this ship's Shields. Continuous Effect: This ship's Shields remain disabled. This ship can only perform Green Maneuvers. This ship rolls +3 attack dice.

Upgrade.Title: Talak'Talan
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card and target all friendly ships. Place a [BATTLESTATIONS] Token beside this ship and all target ships. [RANGE 1-2]

Upgrade.Title: Lamat'Ukan
Upgrade.Ability: WHEN ATTACKING: If this ship spent its [TARGET LOCK] Token to re-roll its attack dice: This ship may convert1 [BLANK] into 1 [HIT].

Upgrade.Title: Romulan Medical Team
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card and target a friendly ship. Remove 1 [DISABLED] Token from all [CREW] Upgrades equipped to target ship. [RANGE 1-2]

Upgrade.Title: Strike From the Shadows
Upgrade.Ability: WHEN ATTACKING: If this ship is Cloaked, discard this card. Flip this ship's [CLOAK] Token to its green side.

Upgrade.Title: Torpedo Fusillade
Upgrade.Ability: The cost of this [WEAPON] is equal to this ship's Primary Weapon Value. The Attack Value of this [WEAPON] is equal to this ship's Primary Weapon Value. ATTACK: Remove this card from the game and target all opposing ships.
